text: Bee yi yεrimi: “Achiika! Annabi Ibrahima, ni Annabi Ismaaila, ni Annabi Is‟haaka, ni Annabi Ya‟akuba, n-ti pahi bɛ yaansi daa nyɛla Yahuudunim‟ bee Nashaaranima?” (Yaa nyini Annabi) Yεlima: “Ka yinima n-leei nyɛ ban mi bee Naawuni?” Dinzuɣu, zualindira bɛ lahi paai ŋun sɔɣi shɛhira shɛli din be o sani n- yi Naawuni sani na. Yaha! Naawuni pala Tamda ka chɛ yi tuuntumsa
